General.Name: Tieling Newcity Investment Holding Ltd
General.Description: Tieling Newcity Investment Holding (Group) Limited engages in urban infrastructure construction and operation activities in China. It is also involved in land development, water supply, sewage treatment, taxi operation, and outdoor advertising media businesses. In addition, the company engages in car rental; new energy development and construction; and wholesale businesses. Tieling Newcity Investment Holding (Group) Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Tieling, China.
